recipes.name: Simple Chicken and Rice
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken breast, prepare rice, and drizzle with olive oil.

recipes.name: Broccoli and Cheese Pasta
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta, steam broccoli, mix with cheese, and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Turkey and Avocado Wrap
recipes.instructions: Cook ground turkey, warm tortillas, and assemble with sliced avocado.

recipes.name: Tomato and Mozzarella Salad
recipes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and cheese, arrange on a plate, drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Serve with toasted bread.

recipes.name: Soy-Ginger Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry chicken with soy sauce and ginger. Serve over rice with sautéed vegetables.

recipes.name: Black Bean and Corn Quesadilla
recipes.instructions: Mix black beans and corn. Spread on tortillas, add cheese, salsa, and cilantro. Fold and cook until cheese melts.

recipes.name: Ground Beef and Sweet Potato Skillet
recipes.instructions: Cook ground beef with sweet potato, onion, and garlic. Season with paprika.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad with Chickpeas
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa, mix with chickpeas, diced cucumber, and tomato. Squeeze lemon juice over and toss.

recipes.name: Spinach and Mushroom Omelette
recipes.instructions: Sauté mushrooms and spinach. Pour beaten eggs over, add cheese and thyme. Cook into an omelette.

recipes.name: Balsamic-Glazed Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions: Grill chicken, toss lettuce and cherry tomatoes. Drizzle with a mixture of balsamic vinegar and olive oil.

recipes.name: Cheesy Garlic Bread
recipes.instructions: Mix grated cheese and minced garlic. Spread on slices of bread and toast until cheese is melted.

recipes.name: Chicken and Broccoli Alfredo
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and broccoli, prepare pasta. In a pan, mix Alfredo sauce, garlic, and Parmesan cheese. Combine with cooked ingredients.

recipes.name: Ground Beef and Black Bean Burritos
recipes.instructions: Cook ground beef, warm black beans, and assemble burritos with tortillas, lettuce, and salsa.

recipes.name: Oregano-Lemon Chicken
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in a mixture of oregano, lemon juice, olive oil, and minced garlic. Grill or bake until cooked through.

recipes.name: Quinoa and Chickpea Stuffed Peppers
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa and chickpeas. Mix with diced tomatoes and cilantro. Stuff bell peppers and bake until tender.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and cheese, arrange on a plate. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Sprinkle with salt.

recipes.name: Couscous and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Cook couscous, stir-fry mixed vegetables with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Mix together.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato and Chickpea Curry
recipes.instructions: Cook sweet potatoes, onions, and garlic. Add chickpeas and coconut milk. Simmer until flavors meld.

recipes.name: Mushroom and Onion Omelette
recipes.instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onions. Pour beaten eggs over, add cheese and thyme. Cook into an omelette.

recipes.name: Honey Mustard Chicken Skewers
recipes.instructions: Mix mustard, honey, soy sauce, and ground cumin. Marinate chicken and thread onto skewers. Grill until cooked.
